env HOME=$WORK/home
gobin -p github.com/gobin-testrepos/non-module@v1.0.0
stdout ^$WORK/home/.cache/gobin/github.com/gobin-testrepos/non-module/@v/v1.0.0/github.com/gobin-testrepos/non-module/non-module'$'
! stderr .+

exec $WORK/home/.cache/gobin/github.com/gobin-testrepos/non-module/@v/v1.0.0/github.com/gobin-testrepos/non-module/non-module
stdout '^I am not a module$'
! stderr .+
